TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but now you can't get paid at all as no one is cooking so there are no dishes to wash!

I wish to have a wish that I knew what to wish for!

Granted, your internet crashes before you can post your wish.

I wish I could stay in bed.

Granted, but you are forced to remain there for the rest of your life.

I wish that I can see the original Cosmos!

Granted but thats all you can see so you walk off a cliff.

I wish I had a perfect cake

Granted. I lied about the perfection, it was made with baking fire instead of baking soda.

I wish for the scroll button to be fixed.

Granted. I fix the scroll button in a parallel universe.

I wish I could get Mechjeb mod

Granted, but the mechjeb units gain sentience and wipe out all your kerbals.

I wish I could fly.

Granted, you can now fly... at one kilometre per hour.

I wish I could enforce grammar naz ism upon the world!

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Gap so the word isn't censored like n a z i.

In an ironic twist of fate, because your wish was not grammatically correct, the whole world enforces its new grammar regime on you.

I wish for a spoon.

And you get what looks like a spoon. It acts like one, but it's a SPORK!

I wish for a piano that doesn't work.

Granted. It's an iPad with Garage Band that won't boot up anymore.

I wish for a new cell phone.

Granted. The phone can only call cells, which don't make very good friends.

I wish for a cell friend.

Granted. I interpret your wish as a friend you have inside a jail cell. You thus spend the rest of your life with this cell friend.

I wish people would stop calling craft that are based off of real craft "replicas" of real craft.

Granted. They build actual replicas of the real rockets instead.

I wish I could meet the original A-Team!

Granted. They're all asses.

I wish for a new extension for Mariyate. [but seriously, she's been trying to fix herself all day]

granted, it's a virus.

I wish for pie

3.141592654.....

I wish for the ability to build and fly a proper SSTO in KSP

Granted it has a dent in its hull that will rupture

I WISH FOR A HOT WOMAN IN MY BED ------- not my wish my friends

Granted, you get a novakid woman. Your bed combusts.

I wish to forget english for a minute.

i wish for the perfect ksp stock rover

Grant Thomsoned. It's so perfect the game crashes.

I wish to divide by 0.

Granted, BEEP ERROR CANOT GRANT WISH. CREATING COW.

I wish that I was not so bored.

Granted. You get on a Blackbird headed for California but it has an engine failure and it crashes.

I wish I could land on other planets in KSP and return.

Wish granted but jeb lithobrakes on the return

i wish for an igloo

Granted. You get an igloo. Need I say more?

I wish it wasn't so darn cold!
